title: New Life Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Ghanaian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small cafe with ocean view serves a lot of vegetarian dishes, including traditional Ghanaian dishes, veggie burgers and more. Has some vegan choices. All food is made-in-house to order.
